mapper.select: select count(*) as value from cbc_lock where lock_name = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into cbc_lock(lock_name,lock_date,lock_host) values (#{value}, sysdate , sys_context('userenv','host'))
insert into cbc_lock(lock_name,lock_date,lock_host) values (#{value}, NULL , NULL)
mapper.delete: delete from cbc_lock where lock_date < #{value, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
